_comment: Created by JMorris on 09/05/2018 14:37:49 using v2.7
title: How has the median treatment waiting time changed in the last five years?
analysis_commentary:
The median referral to treatment (RTT) waiting times for all pathways show small fluctuations from month to month. There were increases in median RTT waiting times for all pathways between Febraury 2013 and Febraury 2018; waits for incomplete pathways increased by 1.5 weeks, waits for admitted pathways increased by 1.1 weeks and waits for non-admitted pathways increased by 1.8 weeks over the same time period.

Updated April 2018.
data_source: NHS England, Referral to Treatment waiting times
